Extra Channel: Channel Energy +2/dy
Spell Focus (Enchantment): +1 Spell DC (Enchantment)
Bleeding Wounds: Successful negative energy spell inflicts 5 HP bleeding/rd (DC 15 Heal or healing effect ends)
Deaf: May cast all spells silently
Empower Spell: May use +2 spell slot to increase chosen spell variable effects by 50%
Final Revelation (Bones Mystery): May cast Bleed or Stabilize 1/rd, Animate Dead at will, and Power Word Kill vs. target w/up to 150 HP 1/dy
Improved Channel: +2 Channel Energy DC
Maximize Spell: May use +3 spell slot to maximize all variable effects on chosen spell
Orisons: Knows level-0 spells
Persistent Spell: May force spell target to take worse of 2 saving throws; uses +2 spell slot
Quicken Spell: May use +4 spell slot to cast chosen spell as a free action 1/rd
Raise The Dead: Summoned 20 HD advanced skeleton or zombie serves for 3 rd 2/dy
Reach Spell: May cast touch, close, or medium range spell at longer range; uses +1 spell slot/range increase
Silent Spell: May use +1 spell slot to cast chosen spell w/out speech
Soul Siphon: R30' Ranged touch inflicts negative level for 3 min and heals 20 HP to self 4/dy
Spirit Walk: May become incorporeal for 20 rd 2/dy
Undead Servitude: May use Command Undead 8/dy
Voice Of The Grave: May use Speak With Dead effects 20 rd/dy; target suffers -8 save
